title: How the support feels when the Marksman actually complements them

replies.body: As an ADC main I feel like complementing your support for good plays is a must to keep them motivated in supporting you. If you piss off your support you might as well kiss your sorry butt goodbye lol.
Support Mains - Stealing butts since 2008.
Exactly, support players tend to be so emotional. If you don't help them deal with their insecurity they're gonna be running down mid and reporting you after the game.
Last time I checked ADC's were the ones who ran it down mid after a mistake.

No, just ADC's with the text Kokoboto above their health-bar.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
That's just Tyler1 or your typical Yasuo/Lee Sin main

you see, this right here is why this happens to you.

This.

This doesn't happen to me at all because the supports I play with aren't emotional train wrecks. When I hear other people complaining about how they're getting abused as a support player than I respond in this manner. I don't see this shit at all when I play support or am playing a different role. NEVER.

If you ain't seen it happen then you can't say it happens. 

If you have seen it happen then you are the issue.

There is no winning for you here, a word of wisdom, run.

Yeah I think this is just a thing for silver players, although I don't recall lashing out at the support when I was in silver. Silver is a hell hole in general, doesn't matter what role you play. If it's only a support issue all these 'support' players need to chill because it happens to everyone in silver regardless of role.

Also this isn't about winning or losing wtf?

Definitely, I really agree with you on that! Usually, some ADCs tend to forget to say "Nice job!" or "Thanks!" after getting a kill/point. I main support roles so it's really nice to hear that from your partner. Sometimes if they don't say anything, it seems as if I (the support) didn't do so well.. :/ That's how I feel. I think any role you play in a game, you should always praise that person to show that you're lucky that they were there to help you! 

Thanks for commenting this. :]{{champion:37}} {{champion:16}} {{champion:267}}

^
Then I proceed to say that I am actually garbage

no! this isnt true!!!!! SINCE WHEN DID ADCS(MARKSMANS) GAVE YOU A COMPLEMENT
when you carry the team from the support role. A* hardcarry support makes their team win via vision war, peeling and good picks.
the worst is when you get flamed for fighting the vision war too aggro :(

You mean going 3/3/14-ish as Braum and the ability to 1v1 their 1/6 ADC? 

I mean I didn't carry but I still found it funny that I could 1v1 their Ashe.
anything braum can do, sion support can do better XD, kek, fight me bro {{champion:14}}
Very well said.

I compliment my support a lot

I see this a lot

I do that when I am complimented

+1
:] It's nice to hear that!
:D
I find that if you compliment your support they are more likely to save you.
More like WHAT IS IT YOU WANT FROM ME THIS TIME
Why is{{champion:103}} supp?
I MEAN I like getting COMPLIMENTS from my marksman, but I don't like when they COMPLEMENT me because that's just another level thing you get me :^)
nice name{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
it's a joke and i hate anything and everything that has to do with weebs and such 8)

And if the other laner is not a marksman and compliment you. 
Are you not happy? Thats racist

what anime is this?
Good this never happens. I wouldn't want my Support to turn into Ahri
{{champion:103}} ?

i rarely adc but i can  tell you how big a difference a good support makes;

 i remember having a blitz complement me on how much dmg i did and how many kills i got and i said thank you and honored him and all, but after that game i realized, i actually did nothing, blitz did everything, he spoon  fed me kills all game and though i wasnt rude i certainly didnt thank him enough.

Since then i've taken to praising my supports on every good play and not only does it work, but now when i adc and forget to boost their confidence is when i tend to lose lane

not long ago i faced a teemo support and for the first 5 minutes i couldnt do anything, CSing was tough and nami didnt do anything except the odd heal until one time teemo stepped out of the bush to Q me and nami actually bubbled him finally (yay) and i took the opportunity to kill teemo and we got ganked n lost 2 for 1 but i was happy she bubbled so i praised her for that well timed bubble n to keep it up  'smiley face'
she started bubbling like crazy after that and we caught up in CS and won the game in the end and i KNOW my biggest play of that whole game was telling nami she did good as i would have been useless without her
Why is her hair brown?
Because it's an edit from the original to be like Imaizumi Kagerou, a Touhou's character
Ah OK

Dam i wish there was a fox support champ like ahri. I mean its been 4 years since the last Female support >>{{champion:267}} So maybe ill get lucky? idk Either way getting a complement as a support feels amazing most my games i end up muting the adc cause if they flame me It makes me want them to die and its kinda my job to keep them alive. lul
